pragma solidity ^0.8.9;

contract CallStackDepthCallerC {
    address contractToCall = address(0x0000000000000000000000000000000001000011);

    function callGetCallStackDepth() public returns(uint256) {
        (bool success, bytes memory data) = contractToCall.call(
            abi.encodeWithSignature("getCallStackDepth()")
        );

        uint256 result = abi.decode(data, (uint256));

        return result;
    }
}

contract CallStackDepthCallerB {
    address callStackDepthCallerC;

    constructor(address _address) public {
        callStackDepthCallerC = _address;
    }

    function callGetCallStackDepth() public returns(uint256) {
        (bool success, bytes memory data) = callStackDepthCallerC.call(
            abi.encodeWithSignature("callGetCallStackDepth()")
        );

        uint256 result = abi.decode(data, (uint256));

        return result;
    }
}
